name: Gangs of Space
description: Gangs of Space is a massively-multiplayer Rogue Shmup where Gangs of players compete for the conquest of the galaxy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Dual core 1.5 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Ping < 500ms to Europe
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad core 2.5 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Ping < 300ms to Europe
